post.body: I assumed you were actually stopped. :-P And at least the weather looks like it'll be reasonably clear for the rest of your drive.
We all hope you don't die. Not texting while driving would help that. :-P
That's one benefit of giving a talk. Mine isn't totally done yet, but I have until tuesday. The problem is the inherant terror of ...
not as cool as I made it sound. They just went to the bakehouse to look at countertop materials. Stil, AB designing a kitchen.
Alton Brown is doing a kitchen makeover show in Ann Arbor, and they're going to Zingerman's.
State data from two government reports. Mean age of first birth = 19.33 + 0.201 * Percentage of residents with college degree.
The average age for first baby in the US is 25, with a fairly strong correlation with education level.
ok, I was planning on waking up in an hour...let's see if I can squeeze a bit more sleep out of today
Apparently people wake up at 8AM on saturdays? Ha! I'm replying to all my email! No one expects that!
Ha! I might have a ride to the airport! From the one grad student that I'm almost positive is terrified of me! Because I'm scary! Rar!
it's great that my tv going to sleep wakes me up. That's great.
AAS slides done, email barrage begging a ride to the airport sent again, basically ready to pack, rar I hate travelling alone.
Damn, I wish I could come up with a good figure for this one slide, and then I'll be done with the slides
I can't believe that it costs basically the same to take a taxi to LAN as it does to take one from LAX to Long Beach.
Apparently that's as many dishes as I'll get done right now. Stupid hot water not being infinite.
blah. doing dishes so my apartment will be 'clean.'
I like how I've sent out like three emails to people today and not gotten responses. I guess this means I'll have to taxi to the airport. :(
Two hours of napping helped somewhat. Unfortunately, I just realized I forgot to print some stuff out, so I'll be going to the office ag ...
ok, despite the fact I have a bunch of stuff to do, I'm going to lie down for a bit and hope I stop wanting to puke.
I wish I knew why I felt so horribly nauseous. Maybe boston market wasn't the best choice for dinner.
